sentence.Network_en: It is quite sound theologically, my lord. But the king will hardly care, provided he reign.
sentence.Network_cn: 从神学观点说,这是无懈可击的, 阁下. 不过, 只要国王掌权的话,恐怕对此是不会在乎的.

sentence.Network_en: He dealt with the problem of evil theologically, not philosophically.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以神学而非哲学的方式处理了这个罪恶的问题.

sentence.Network_en: Theologically, Luthar was into reorientation mutation.
sentence.Network_cn: 在神学方面, 路德从事转向变异.
